summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Two Hundred Thirty-eight and 39/100 (238.39) Dollars, from the General Fund, as so much thereof as may be necessary, to pay the City's portion of the cost of the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue South, from 120 feet north of Plum Street, to Rainier Avenue by constructing sewers, as provided for in Ordinance No. 16783, creating Local Improvement District No. 1563.
